website_summaries.verdict: For a charger that needs to be able to withstand a bit more abuse, no others can compete with the Elite.
pros: Housed in a more rugged case designed to withstand scrapes, dents, and drops, this charger is also equipped with the same great technology as the PowerPort II
Both USB ports are also illuminated, making it look great and easy to find in the dark
cons: Can be a bit loose in the electrical outlet
The blue LED stays on permanently, which can be annoying if kept near your bed at night
Also does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge technology

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: There's some issues with this charger! The charge is inconsistent with green & blue light flipping back & forth. The sparkling fire from the connector to the power. Dangerous!!! I have to unplug it to avoid any fire hazard!!! I need to return it but has just passed the 30-day window period. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Halim

customer_reviews.title: worked for 3 days, then shorted out  ***Update! ANKER reached out to replace it and it works
customer_reviews.text: 2020: Customer Service has contacted me to send me a new version - ***The new version has a circle blue ring that looks pretty cool and I have had no issues charging so far. Perhaps the one I had years ago was a bad batch - in any case - it has been replaced and I am happy now! Old Review - It worked for 3 days then shorted out randomly in our hotel room. The charger doesnt light up blue and does not work, continuously pops if I try to connect and disconnnect. Sigh, left waiting to use my friend's chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Cons

customer_reviews.title: Got a iPhone X? If so ....THIS IS YOUR CHARGER!
customer_reviews.text: Hey Guys!!!! Well decided to go this route being Apple wants $35-$40 is bucks for a fast charger. We love our new iPhone X’s but the standard charger is a slow charger for the IPhone X’s which stinks!!! I feel if we spend $1000+ On a phone you should provide us with Fast Chargers like most Samsung phones do!!! Sorry 🤣 for the rant..anyway these chargers are super awesome. Super fast charger and I should have bit the bullet sooner so guys if guy got a iPhone X this is 100% goto charger!!! I was so impressed I bought 2 😉 BE sure to follow us for future purchases!!!
customer_reviews.author: Just A Couple

customer_reviews.title: Material feels like cheap plastic that can melt
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive after recommendation from my sister. Charger is bigger than description states and material feels like cheap plastic that will melt while trying to charge electronics. Charger became extremely hot after being plugged in for 45 minutes. Considering a return before damage occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Betzabe A.

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 2 weeks then just cut out. Blue light does not light up and no longer charges after just two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ITEM DOES NOT DO WHAT IT IS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: It is beyond overhyped on amazon this product is not good i do not reccomend . I bought this because i thought it was good , well the fast charger that comes with my phone will fully charge my phone from 20% to 100% in 50 min . It also cleary dictates whether its normal charging or fast charging . This doesnt even fast charge and it takes it 1h and 30 min to go from 20% to 100% . It charges slow and the box came damaged . I would stay away.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: DO BUY! Had an issue, company rectified even after return window closed.  Stand up company, good product!
customer_reviews.text: OLD REVIEW: <<<<Stopped working completely in 2 months time. Waste of money. Do not buy.>>>> EDIT: Customer service reached out to me to remedy this problem and sent me a new item that is working. I love a company that stands behind their products, good job Anker. Thanks! Will buy Anker again!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for amount 2 months then quit. Most products you can get a refund or exchange for but this company doesn't warrently past 30 days. Never will buy Anker products again.
customer_reviews.author: Joilyn

customer_reviews.title: Does not meet FCC requirements
customer_reviews.text: While this charger seemed to work well as a charger, we used it as part of a required test for RF emissions as required by the FCC for another product. During the test, we found that the charger failed he test. It passed with no load but with a 1/2 amp load, it failed. It was noted that there is no FCC number on it.
customer_reviews.author: mhubel

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work and screen views as "Not Charging."
customer_reviews.author: Global Shopper

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED.
customer_reviews.text: After my original review the Anker Team reached out to me because I was extremely disappointed with the way this charged my Samsung galaxy note 5. They had explained that I had purchased the wrong power brick for my note 5. They then proceeded to offer me the correct one for me to try and review. After finding out this power brick was better suited to an iPhone's 0ersuasiin I tested it on my wife's phone. This thing is niceee! I could not be more happy with the Anker Teams customer service as they went above and beyond 150%!!! Thank you Anker!!! I will always recommend this brand to all my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Kalob M

customer_reviews.title: Updated review....Does not "fast charge", but it's not terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Read update at the end after original review... In the description it clearly states fast charging. Plugged in my phone, just regular charging. Tried the other usb port, same. Tried different cables, different charge time, but still regular charging. Though when I compared to my fast charger time, it was only about 30% slower. So not terrible. But if you advertise fast charging, it needs to fast charge. Update: After this review, the company contacted me and offered to send a newer, better charger that would for sure fast charge. The new model costs twice as much as this model. That is customer service right there! Hats off to these guys, that's the way you build a company!
customer_reviews.author: Tbern

customer_reviews.title: This plug almost started a fire
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item a few months back. It was plugged into my wall in a room that had nothing else plugged in. Nothing was plugged into charger. I heard a bang and then lost power in that part time of my house. The plug blew up in the wall!! (See photo) order with caution!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Walker

customer_reviews.title: Half doesn't work! Edited review.
customer_reviews.text: Only one port works; very disappointed in this product. After I wrote the review I was contacted by the company who offered to send me a new one (newer model also). Excellent customer service so I hope it will continue to work appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Dmae

customer_reviews.title: Slow Charge and Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: I am an Anker fan so this product threw me off with it's poor design and function. It has a bright blue large LED that lights up half my bedroom at night. It the product is plugged in, it should have power. There is no optional power button, so why is there a bright LED on a phone charger just to tell me it has power? Also, this charges my phones SLOWER than a 3-year old Samsung charger... that is odd, usually technology doesn't go backward. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Necessary for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work, and have been using this Anker charger for about a year. It works very well, is extremely durable, and the outlet prongs fold in for travel. It survives being dropped, carried in luggage, and regular wear-and-tear very well. I liked my first charger so much, I bought two more just last week. I now have these spread out over my house, and one I will keep exclusively for travel. I also appreciate the dual charging ports, so I can charge my phone and my wireless headphones simultaneously. The 24W charger handles both devices and does not sacrifice any charging speed. Everyone needs this USB charger.
customer_reviews.author: Sir E.

customer_reviews.title: Ughh Very nice quality, I am in love and I take ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously guys, If you have an iphone X or 8 plus, you definitely need one of these strong chargers. With the normal small Apple plug it takes 2-3 hours to charge my iphone X. With this, less than an hour! its 24W! even double the speed of the large ipad block. I don't get why Apple make you pay over $1000 for a big iphone and not include one of these strong chargers! Very nice quality, I am in love and I take it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Marah

customer_reviews.title: still working great
customer_reviews.text: I am reluctant to give a review of something like this too soon given off brands tend to have a short life. I have now owned this for over a year and it is working great!!! I am charging either two of our household iphones (X, 8+, 6 and 6S) or an iphone and ipad at the same time and all my products charge great with this charge. I have also used apple charge cables and off brand charge cables with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Pace

customer_reviews.title: Not so great... Could cause a fire.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the the charge is fantastic, it’s not to bad for traveling. It’s a little bigger than a iPad charger. I thought that the charger was 24w in each port, but it’s actually 12w in each port. It’s still fast never the less and a good high quality product. Update: I have been using it for about 5 months, recently I plugged it in and there was a spark. I tried plugging it in different outlets but I still have the same issue. This is not a safe product, It could cause a fire. I have stoped using this product I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Cazoo

customer_reviews.title: It finally died today
customer_reviews.text: I've had this charger for 29 months until this morning when the fold-in plug finally broke off. Between then and now I've used this charger every single day, traveled with it many times, and I've been very satisfied with it's performance. I seriously considered buying the exact same model, but due to how many more devices I have now I have opted to replace this unit with the Anker PowerPort 6. Anker has earned my trust, and my recommendations to all my friends and clients. It is my opinion that you can buy the PowerPort 2, and most any other Anker device, with confidence that you will get performance worth more than what you payed.
customer_reviews.author: Vulpes Abnocto

customer_reviews.title: Dependable, fast reasonably small USB charger
customer_reviews.text: I admit it, I generally only buy Anker products for my charging needs. They don’t break and they seem to charge as fast or faster than anyone else. I’ve swapped my 2 USB charger for someone’s single USB charger, so we can share the lone plug, and usually they tell me they can’t believe how much faster they are charging. I travel globally, so dependability is every thing. I either lose them or give them to desperate peers who’s original cable or gas station cable or charger has failed.
customer_reviews.author: gogowiz1

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Starting off I'd like to say I've always seen Anker as a reputable company. But I am just quite disappointed in the charger I bought a couple months ago. It didn't even last the full 2 months, and stopped working entirely. Keep in mind when I travel it's in a carrying case, nice and protected. I've never had problems with cheap charger blocks before so to see Anker give me a product like this really doesn't feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Powell

customer_reviews.title: Easily gets knocked out of socket
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Dual usb plug Sleek design compact Cons: Easily falls out of the wall socket I would love this product if it just stayed plugged in. With the regular Apple brick, you have to really tug at the cord to remove it from the wall socket. This one easily falls out. Also, I know it says charges it charges your devices faster but I don't really notice a difference. I already contacted support and they sent me a new one but I still have the issue. I've tried different outlets and different power strips. Anker products are generally really good but I think this one is just not that good.
customer_reviews.author: Jules B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I touched my phone that was charging with this charger while I was wearing earbuds plugged into my (grounded) computer, and I suddenly felt a painful continuous shock in my ear. Busted out a multimeter and measured a 40-50 volt difference between the charger's "ground" pin and the actual ground. I tested some other USB C chargers and the only other one that came close to this level was another Anker. Both went right into the trash. I'm pretty disappointed, because I previously swore by Anker products; back to OEM for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Moliski

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked flawlessly for about 6 weeks. Then all of the sudden, it hardly charges my Google Pixel. It will charge, but it takes about 12 hours. It's been in the same outlet since I bought it, so I know I didn't drop it or anything. So I had to use my old charger for that. Still seems to be charging my Vapes and Bluetooth speakers fine. I guess because they don't require as many amps. Maybe I just got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not fast charge; not even with a compatible fast charge cable.
customer_reviews.text: Its not quick charge nor is it fast charging. I bought a 'fast charge' cable and it doesn't charge fast. It's just a regular charger. You'll get your phone charge in about 2 hours or more; just like a 5 W would charge. It's so disappointing because I love anker because they make great products. This product just wasn't one of them. Ps I tried using my own phone (samsung A20) & my boyfriend's & it definitely isn't IQ nor fast charge. Still, anker makes amazing headphones & portable battery packs
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent a new product to replace broken unit, amazing support.
customer_reviews.text: Well I purchased this to power both of my Wireless Chargers also from anker. The stand that has a fan, and the flat circle that has a fan. Both would not work and simply had the power light blinking on the chargers. If anker does reach out to me to fix this issue I will change my review. djheidingsfelder@gmail.com UPDATE Anker shipped me a new (slightly different) wall port and it works amazingly. 5 stars as their support was amazing and helped me solve my issue in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Heidingsfelder

customer_reviews.title: Good normal speed charger.
customer_reviews.text: I have an HTC phone with a quick charger that puts out 2.5A. This charger puts out 2.4A in each port. Apparently that .1A difference equals a twice as long charging time. I also tried it with my switch and pro controller. Both of those could not charge while in use just kept it at same percentage. Plugged in my HTC charger and they both started charging. I'll use it as an extra charger for other things as it is still better than some of my older chargers but this is not quick charger. I would recommend any of their quick charge 3.0 chargers but avoid this one if you are looking for speedy charging.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Owl

customer_reviews.title: Great charger with some issues
customer_reviews.text: I love Anker products and this USB Charger is no exception. It charges my iPhone fast. This makes me happy. What I doesn’t make me happy is, the prongs to plug it in are off centered and so the plug can rock back and forth in the outlet and at times, it comes unplugged, which is annoying. It also lights up which will light up your dark bedroom and cause sleep difficulties. I fixed that by putting a piece of electrical tape of the light.
customer_reviews.author: CAV

customer_reviews.title: Works well but doesn't fast charge.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to replace two chargers and to free up an outlet. The primary reason that I chose this particular charger was for it's fast charging capability. The item seems to be well made. Unfortunately it doesn't actually fast charge. I thought it may have been the two new charging cables, but when they were plugged into my original fast charge plugs the cables fast charge just fine. I won't return this item because I should be able to use it in another application where fast charging isn't critical. But was somewhat disappointed that it didn't deliver on it's fast charging claim.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Comer

customer_reviews.title: Worked while it lasted, but not too long
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for the short time it worked. I had it plugged into a surge protector under the couch for phone charging for about 6 months and then it quit working. It started to work again but won't fast charge, which was the reason I bought it in the first place. Update: I was contacted after my review and a replacement was sent. The new one works as the original had, fast charging again. Time will tell if it lost, but for now, I'm good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent company that stands behind their products
customer_reviews.text: Anker is my "go to" brand for accessories to my electronic devices. Electronics being electronics, occasionally there will be a problem with a product. I purchased two of these chargers, one of which stopped working after the Amazon return window had closed. So I contacted Anker directly and they quickly responded to my inquiry, stood behind their product and immediately replaced it. I highly recommend this company both for the quality of their products and the quality of their customer service. Thank you Anker!!
customer_reviews.author: RetrieverMom

customer_reviews.title: Received a bad charger, but the customer service was on point.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mid October and it broke already. I don’t know what happened to it but it started sparking in any outlet I may try to put it into and wouldn’t charge my phone. Threw it out immediately as it seemed like a fire hazard. ***EDIT*** They sent me the upgraded version on this charger to rectify the faulty charger and it works perfectly. They contacted me immediately upon reviewing my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Y

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay secure in outlet
customer_reviews.text: The charger works well once plugged in however does not stay firmly secured in the outlet. Due to the weight of it and it’s loose fit it sits at an angle and appears as though it’s about to fall out. It is also hard to plug in as the prongs appears to be too close together and it has to be wiggled to get started to go in the outlet. I would save my money and not buy this again...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works and Great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review 11 months after receiving the charger. I have been very happy with it. It charges my devices at 24W much faster than the time it takes with the standard 5W Apple charger. I also love the two USB ports, esp when traveling. After 11 months it stopped working. It wasn't expensive but I decided to message the company online via Amazon. I was amazed receiving an immediate response and with no effort I received a new replacement charger within days. This company stands behind their product and thank you for replacing after 11 months the unit that failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Post

customer_reviews.title: 2 for (almost) the price of !  - Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this USB charger to power two sets of LED lights which illuminate the music stand of our grand piano. The lights work on battery or via USB power they cannot plug directly into a normal electrical wall socket. You can buy lots of single USB chargers but this one takes 2 USB plugs and uses only one of the normally dual wall electrical outlets. Magical!! It works perfectly with the LED lights and we are thrilled to have it. Note that the electrical plug does fold to get out of the way if you want to use this plug as a carry-along power source.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with iPad
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work in charging my iPad. It connected to the unit and had the charging icon but the battery was still draining. Very disappointed as this was the only reason I purchased this unit. It does work with my iPhone. I started the return process about an hour after receiving the charger and trying all the things to make it work. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Fox Doula

customer_reviews.title: The Best Two Port Charger I Have Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST two port charger I have ever purchased. I am very pleased with it. I am able to charge both by Kindle Fire HD (2017 version) and my Samsung Galaxy Prime Core phone at the same time. Both charge very quickly. Much faster then other chargers. I have a ten foot braided power cord and it still works fine. The charger is sturdy and well built. I like the fold down plug that snaps in to place when you need to plug it in. I also like the blue light that lets you know the charger is working. The light is not bright, so it will not disturb you at night. I highly recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and product.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Was contacted by AnkerDirect and after troubleshooting the charger, they express mailed me a replacement. After running it through its paces, new unit works great. Thank you AnkerDirect for such phenomenal customer service. Got a defective one. Even though I've had this for over a year, we haven't used it much as it always charged slowly. Put on the shelf last summer but just pressed it back into service in January. Same annoyingly dismal performance (changes my galaxy s7 usually from 40% takes close to 4 hours) . My Anker car charger performance is about twenty minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Peregrine72

customer_reviews.title: The Charger to Rule them All
customer_reviews.text: This charger is simply revolutionary. My family and I used the charger while on a cruise ship (the Disney Wonder) and while on the ship we attempted to give this charger a run for its money. It certainly preformed at tip top performance. Having multiple phones and watches (apple products for reference), the charger charged a near dead phone (15%) in a little over an hour which is impressive! Thoroughly enjoyed the functionality and the ease of use of this product, get yourself an Anker Elite charger today!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Elite 2? Meh. Works well though.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this is marketed as an upgrade. I have the old version, which has been a great performer for years. These days I have to be careful plugging it in as the hinged prongs are getting loose. The old version feels a little more solid, but the new one is a matte plastic that won’t get as scratched as the slick old version. Most confusingly, the old version had two LED colors so you could tell at a glance when the device(s) were some charging. Not so with the new version. Nonetheless, a well made product that does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Frugal Demanding

customer_reviews.title: Works but it is too big, heavy for a plug
customer_reviews.text: It charges my Samsung / android phone and my apple ipad ... so that’s the good thing. But this device it big, heavy and falls out of the wall socket way too easy! I’m constantly having to plug it back in... it just doesn’t sit in the socket snug...I’ve tried it in a half dozen wall outlets and it’s all the same...just falls out after awhile or with the slightest little tug on the cord.... very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: PSSI

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in outlet
customer_reviews.text: The design of having the prongs are one end of the device and with space between a wall socket and the rest of the device means there is leverage for the weight to pull the device out of the wall socket. The only way I have been able to keep the thing consistently plugged in and generally resisting falling out is to shim the device and bend the prongs to make it a tighter fit in the socket. Even then it is an uneasy solution - and plainly not an out-of-box product. It works fine on power strips on the floor (with slightly bent prongs), but not in wall sockets. Unfortunate, as the double usb ports are useful.
customer_reviews.author: J. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Now working with APPLE IPAD-PRO, barely works wih Samsung S7
customer_reviews.text: It is working OK with Samsung Devices, yet the charge level is 6 hrs vs 1.5 hrs with Samsung Original item. HOWEVER - IT IS NOT WORKING for APPLE products. My iPAD-PRO 12.7 refuses to charge from it, yet charges fine from Samsung S7 charger (what an irony) So, if you are looking for charger that works for iPAD-PRO - Look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry S Eliseev

customer_reviews.title: It works great - IF you can prevent it from falling out of the socket
customer_reviews.text: I've had a dual charger before but it shorted out with a nice fireball and needed to be replaced. This looked great and suited my needs at a good price. HOWEVER, I've given up on trying to keep it from falling out of the socket without a lot of effort. It's too heavy and the prongs are too short. My solution involved both a box of Tums (appropriate since this thing gives me heartburn), a strategically placed pen, and the support of a single adaptor which ACTUALLY FITS in the socket. Once I've propped it in place, it charges rapidly and effectively. Just don't waste your money - unless you have both Tums and a spare pen handy.
customer_reviews.author: KattC

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of garbage does not charge at the rate it's advertised as. I bought it instead of apple's fancy, overpriced fast charger that can charge up the new iPhones super fast. After using it a few times I realized it charges at the same rate of my regular apple chargers which made this purchase pointless as I already had a few of those.
customer_reviews.author: Hooman

customer_reviews.title: Great Charging Block
customer_reviews.text: Great quality charger. I have a about 5 of these chargers and they are the only block that I use for my iPhone, iPad, wireless headphones, and any other USB charging devices. The IQ charger helps to charge much quicker than most standard blocks and makes sure you are getting the correct output for your device (as long as you don’t exceed what the block is rated for). It is also great for charging power banks. I have had one of my blocks die on me and once I contacted Anker they replaced it for me right away. They have great customer service and I have really liked the products of theirs that they own.
customer_reviews.author: UDM2013

customer_reviews.title: very well made!
customer_reviews.text: first off - when you open the package the unit itself is packaged in static bag. It took my iphone XR under 35 minutes to charge my phone to 100% from 3% - very impressive!! if you want to charge your iphone Xr fast - go to settings, battery, battery health, turn off optimized battery charging. turn it back on after completing the charge. completely satisfied with my purchase! i bought two, one for work and one for home. i also bot two 10ft charger cables made by Anker love this company!
customer_reviews.author: sarah cassford

customer_reviews.title: Failure of registration made me Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used this several days, but so far it’s doing very well. It charged my phone very quickly. We’re keeping it by the sofa where we sit frequently while using our devices. I like the dual USB ports for our 2 devices. I tried to register for an extended warranty, but I never received the email confirmation after multiple tries so I am unhappy about that. A week later: registration is impossible and all they want is your information. The webpage wouldn’t even recognize the Amazon other number! Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bev T

customer_reviews.title: Takes long time to charge phone and iPad
customer_reviews.text: It’s great that it can charge 2 electronics at once, especially since I have limited sockets. However, it takes twice as long to charge my iPhone and iPad. Not sure if it’s just not powerful enough or is it because both electronics are drawing their power from the same plug. (I’m clueless as to how these things are supposed to work) Guess I’ll ask my grown children. But because we are hardly leaving the house anyway any more, I just leave my phone and iPad plugged in all the time to make sure they stay charged.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi K.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fast charge.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these- one for work, one for home. Neither one fast charges my phone. I have a Samsung Note 8, which is perfectly capable of taking a fast charge. My cables are all USB 3.0, which will conduct a fast charge. If I plug my phone and cable into my single port fast charging block, it fast charges just fine. I've tried several outlets and 2 other phones as well. It only slow charges from either port. This is definitely not the quality I expected of Anker.
customer_reviews.author: Julisa

customer_reviews.title: I love this Anker product
customer_reviews.text: I love Anker and their product just as a disclosure. No they don’t send me product to test (I wish) I bought 8 of these 1 set for me, my wife, and my youngest. We all travel for LAX to her tournaments and need to charge cell phones or other items all the time. It has 2 ports for 2 different cords to plug into, (LOVE THIS) I get 2 cords into 1 socket and charge both items at the same time. I know people complain about it not working well the 8 have worked so far for me about 1/2 a month now. We use 1 or 2 daily to charge our phones.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. O.

customer_reviews.title: I have like 6 or 7 of these!
customer_reviews.text: They're cheap, reliable, and effective. Ive been buying Anker for many years and they don't disappoint because if its not broken, they'll leave it the way it is. And you can bet its good quality no matter what, despite the FEW duds you hear about here and there. I have a couple of these chargers from 5 years ago and they're still working just as well as the two new ones that I JUST got in the mail today. I just needed a couple more for travel and a couple other places in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tupu

customer_reviews.title: I Wanted 2 USB Ports
customer_reviews.text: I have had a 1-Port USB Wall Charger from Anker for years now, and it still works well. But lately I have been using more devices at a time and so after looking I thought for the price I could go with this new 2-Port Charger. I have a Moto G Cell Phone and I have 10ft and 6ft Anker Cords, a SanDisk Mp3 Player, Anker SoundCore Speaker, and a big Anker Battery Pack. I have charged 2 Devices from the above using this Charger and had 0 issues. I will soon be taking this on the Road and try it in Hotels and such.
customer_reviews.author: J Doe

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my charging issues for my iPad Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I usually leave my iPad Pro on charge over night. When I plugged it in it gave me the “I’m charging” battery with the lightening bolt through it. Recently I would find it in the morning with a “not charging” message on it. I thought it was the cable so I replaced it. The problem persisted. I was afraid there was something wrong with the charging port on the tablet. As a last ditch effort to resolve the problem I ordered this charger. Problem solved! My tablet charges faster than ever now. I’m thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: LabandWhippetMom

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Useful and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that has treated me well. I love that it allows you to charge two products at the same time. It makes things really convenient in my house. I'm considering purchasing one or two more to have in a few different rooms throughout the house. In addition to phones, my household charges items like tablets, remote controlled toy cars, Bluetooth portable speakers, and more. When preparing for a beach trip, all these items must be charged, so it makes it easier to do the charging with this dual port. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DeedsUA

customer_reviews.title: Anker is the standard
customer_reviews.text: Anker is the standard by which I measure charging cables and the like. They use superior wiring on the inside, durable outsides, and still have competitive prices. For this wall adapter specifically, it feels premium. I have several others by different brands that are all about the same size, and this one feels more solid and slightly heavier. It’s output is sufficient pretty rapid phone charging or handling more demanding devices like tablets and power banks. It has indicator lights to let you know it’s delivering power which I like. If you want the option to toggle this feature off, look into NXT Technology adapters by Staples.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 5 of these and they work great EXCEPT for the last one I received on November 30, 2019. 4 1/2 months later I go to unplug it and one of the tines stays in the outlet. Only One side. I had to turn off the electricity to the outlet to get it out. Very scary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Charger for All Devices in 2020
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this charging port for about 8 months now and have not noticed any significant changes in charge duration or efficiency. It still charges my phone in about 2 hours . I have taken it to Alaska and back twice now and would say it’s relatively convenient for the airport and train stations. In conclusion I would say that this is a product you want to buy if you are wanting something that can deliver a fast charge and one that will NOT suddenly break over time.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Good power.
customer_reviews.text: My phone always lets me know charging at a slower rate because I have a lot of regular cords around. I keep it next to the bed with my good cord and both phones are a go in no time. Worth the money. On an extension cord you loose the other plug. Have not plugged it into a wall so someone else can comment on the height. Will a real wall outlet allow for the expected height on top? I change the review if I have more info. Probably will buy a second one to carry in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typical Anker: Oustanding quality and consistent performance
customer_reviews.text: This is a typical example of an Anker product. It performs its intended function as well as can be expected, has good fit and finish, and comes a solid value for the price. This is not a Qualcomm quick-charge adapter, but it provides a consistent 2.4 a to both ports and doesn't get too hot under sustained charging. Anker is now an established brand, and their prices are not as competitive as they once were. They have great customer service, though, and a reputation that's tough to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Phone & Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've got an iPhone and iPad and was looking for one charger to handle both devices at the same time. This comes in handy when traveling and plugs are at a premium but works just as well at home because the Anker Elite Charger puts out enough power (24 watts) to charge both devices faster than the charger that comes with the device. It will charge any device with a standard USB charging cable. I'd highly recommend this charger to anyone looking for one charger that supports 2 devices at the same time or a quality travel charger.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kay

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: [Update] I complained on this review that my charger won't work and Anker contacted me and sent me a new charger really fast. The charger looks like it went through an upgrade. It is smaller and shinier now. And most importantly it works well to charge my phone. It worked well for a month. 1 month! Now I plug it in and it doesn't light up and it doesn't charge..
customer_reviews.author: DannyBird

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something a little bulkier than your standard power adapter, this thing is more sturdy than I expected. The flip plug is solid, it stays in place whether you have it up or down. Been using this with the Powerline+ II lightning cable and it seems to charge my iphone a little faster than my old cheap stuff, could just be the placebo effect. Overall pretty happy, cheaper than the official Apple power adapter and quality is nice. Update: Still going strong 2 months later. Still paired with the powerline+ II and I swear it really does seem to charge my XR noticeably faster, as long as you're careful with it I think it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: A. U.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charger for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Having used this charger since mid January 2019, I would highly recommend it, but use a high-quality cable to take full advantage of its charging capabilities. Anker's own Powerline II cable, which I use, works very well with this charger, capable of charging my iPhone X and iPad Pro to full power pretty quickly. My only gripe is the sheer size of the charger, which I wished was a tad smaller.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chuang

customer_reviews.title: Have Bought More Anker Products Since
customer_reviews.text: I was admittedly skeptical buying an electronic device from a brand I wasn't familiar with. However, this charger works just as well as any Apple charger I've owned, but at a better price. PLUS I love that I have two ports to work with. I've charged a number of devices - iPhone, Samsung tablet, FitBit, etc. - with this and never had any issues with compatibility that I've had with other wall adapters. It charges quickly, and I like that I can fold the prongs in. Just bought an Anker portable charger and hope it lives up to the quality of this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Eller

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. I haven’t even been using it for a year, and it already doesn’t charge any devices. It does not charge my Apple Watch or my iPhone. Bought in October, 2019 and one USB plug stopped working in July, 2020. The 2nd USB plug stopped working August 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Wall chargers are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger February of 2018 was in rehab from a stoke and hard attack which left me handicapped the charger stopped working and the warranty had run out bye a week so at the time didn’t bother to get a hold of Anker I will not buy another wall charger from Anker but I have to say there other products are great I am revising my review Anker has taken care of the problem I hope that the rest of you who don’t buy Anker you need to they make a good product
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dual port charger! My friends were always asking me if they could use my charge cord. Sometimes I was charging myself. Now they can just plug in without asking me. I really like the range of voltage from 100-220 volts. I can now travel abroad and take my charger with me and it will work anywhere! Great product and price!!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these due to the good reviews but after a week they did not work. I tried to charge a tablet phone at the same time and ever since then even if I'm charging one device at a time, it will not charge more than 2% PER HOUR! Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER RAZWICK

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought it was me because it would work fine and then the next time the blue LED light ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit started working intermittently after only a few uses. At first I thought it was me because it would work fine and then the next time the blue LED light wouldn't even light up when I plugged it in. Then it would work again a few days later. Very inconsistent and unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Coe

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED CHARGING. STOP LIGHTING
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's iPad, left it to charge overnight, she woke up to get started with her online/distance schooling because of this Pandemic her school is CLOSED for the rest of the YEAR, and guess what? NOTHING! After a short two and half weeks use of this charger, it stopped working, it's not LIGHTING and is not CHARGING. I have several other ANKER products, many chargers, and batteries, and I never had this problem. Please perform better QC.
customer_reviews.author: A. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Reliable compact charger that will probably outlive your device.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality as I expected it to be. This is my 2nd Anker power adapter. My previous one didn't die or quit on me, it was appropriated by my girlfriend for her use. It's easier for me to get a new one than retrieving it. As expected it handles any device I plug into it. It's not designed to be a high-speed fast charger for the newer phones. However it's tremendous for the other devices.
customer_reviews.author: kniteman

customer_reviews.title: Terrific travel charger
customer_reviews.text: Well built and gets the job done. Although it doesn't quick-charge my Samsung Galaxy S8 (and isn't meant to; I knew that from reading the product description before purchase), its adaptive charge circuitry doe charge the phone faster than the OEM charger. Anker makes excellent products. I have several of their USB-C cables, several car chargers and a Bluetooth speaker. All are high quality and ruggedly built. In addition, Anker's customer service is superb. I wouldn't hesitate to buy this or any Anker product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work
customer_reviews.text: It sucks at charging. I will have my phone plugged in all night and it won't charge a single percent. It has to be plugged into the wall a specific way at a specific angle in order to charge, and if you even nudge it 0.1 millimeters, it won't charge anymore.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkiesAhead

customer_reviews.title: Anker excellence
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these plugs I've bought since I keep adding items needing to be plugged in. Just like all the other Anker products I've bought (listed below), it's well designed, reasonably priced and works great. One of the great features is that it's designed to leave one outlet on your receptacle free. Any time I want a computer accessory, I first check to see if there's an Anker version. My Anker buys: Bluetooth keyboard, iPad stand, three of these wall plugs, lightning cords, and two power banks - 5200 mAh and 10000 mAh.
customer_reviews.author: ceilidh

customer_reviews.title: Fine and Fast
customer_reviews.text: I had grown tired of dual chargers that skimp on the level of power throughput until I found this 2 USB port charger. Following a delivery mix-up by Amazon, the replacement arrived and was put to use that very day. Now, two iPhones can be charged simultaneously and quickly. If you are used to the slightly and older style of Apple chargers, this one will be familiar in size and shape. But, as stated, it has 2 ports, Very happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but I expected better
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Cheaper than the competition - About 2 A per each USB - Durable build Cons: - Does not Quick charge. - Heavier and not nearly as portable as more common USB charging bricks. - Bright blue light always on (wastes energy)
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient charging block for 2 devices
customer_reviews.text: In era of proliferating portable electronic devices. I wanted location besides bedroom for recharging devices as they run down later in day. This charging block is plugged in near TV where we sit in evening, enables me to restore both phone and Fitbit simultaneiously as needed, while keeping them close at hand. This is at least 4th such Anker-branded "tool" I have bought. Have been pleased with function, styling and reliability of all.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Jean

customer_reviews.title: Charged my Iphone 6 & IPad mini quickly
customer_reviews.text: Using the charger that I got in the box from APPLE when I purchased my IPhone was taking a long time. A really long time. My kids have been using my devices all the time during COVID19 and by the time they would be done, I would be at 8%. I immediately used the Anker Dual Port Charger and within a few minutes it went from 8% to 17%. With the old charger, that would take an hour to get there. So far it has been working out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Code name April

customer_reviews.title: Misleading item description, not fast charging at all
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and was very excited to try it out. I specifically purchased it so I could charge my phone and my power bank. It is NOT fast charging. I dont know why they have that promise in the item description because when I plugged in my phone it would have taken over two hours to charge, compared to half that with the phone charger. I'm currently using it to charge my power bank, which will probably take all night and at least part of tomorrow. I'm pretty disappointed so far.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality 2 usb charger
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a two usb charger because I needed something to charge my phone and my watch at night. I decided to get this one because a lot of the cheaper chargers looked like they were shorting out per some of the reviews. Anyway, I may have spent a little bit more than other products, but at least I am confident in the Anker brand. I’ve only had this for a few days, but I like it so far!
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of this particular charger. I usually purchase it for my two boys who have iPad minis. The first one I purchased a couple of years ago lasted about 1.5 years which I would think is pretty decent for a double charger as rough as my boys are. I just Recently purchased two more one for my daughters and another one for the boys because the first one I bought them just went out but it lasted a very long time so I am pleased. I hope they do not discontinue these charges only upgrade them because to me they seem to be better than the standard Apple chargers and I will keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Karame_Kurls

customer_reviews.title: upgrade from your stock apple wall charger already!
customer_reviews.text: I primarily bought this to go with my Anker Qi charger, since I didn't have any decent usb wall chargers (just iphone oem and other generics that come with products). Works great and having an additional port is convenient. The blue light on it doesn't cause any issues for us and it's been used daily for about 2 months or so without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: long life and works great plug folds in for travel
customer_reviews.text: I've been very pleased with this brand and type of charger. bought first one a couple years ago. This is the 4th one I've gotten ((all still working great) . makes great gifts to family and friends. Nice to charge phone and ear buds at same time in the same place on one plug outlet. (keeps them together) plug folds in for travel and it only takes up 1 plug space on the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. It works. My wife uses it to charge her phone and watch at night and she can still have a reading light plugged into the outlet. I can’t speak to the speed of charging as I don’t use it but it seems to be the same or faster than the normal cube Apple sends with their devices. I don’t think it’s as fast as the chargers that come with the iPads though. I’d have to do some side by side testing and well, I’m just not going to take the time to do that. It’s a nice size and the quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: WC

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you love your iPhone and want to protect your investment, this the charger for you. Apple is rather picky about chargers that should be used on their products. They want you to enjoy the quality and extend the battery life for as long as possible. This one fits the bill. Fast charging without the risk of over charge that shortens battery life. I figure if Apple will recommend it and are willing to sell it in their stores, it must be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Rich O.

customer_reviews.title: Not fast charger
customer_reviews.text: These are good chargers but recently changed from LG Stylo 4 to the LG Q70. The newer phone these charging blocks are not fast charging capable on the LG Q70. They just charge, when using supplied block from LG it says fast charging.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny B

customer_reviews.title: This Power Chargers Is Good
customer_reviews.text: Whoa! Powered Chargers Are Good! This is Not A Paid Review :) Seriously I have never charged two devices at the same time like this Puppy can charge iPhone and Android at the same time better than stock OEM chargers from Apple and Samsung...Whoa Oh Yeah!.... forgot to mention I even used two 10' cables on two phones I've never had a good charge from a stock charger and this one device does work. Thank You Anker for a Good Product
customer_reviews.author: SD Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works But Won't Stay Plugged In
customer_reviews.text: While the charger works well, I can't give it a good review because it won't stay plugged into the wall. Whoever designed this was rather clueless. It's quite heavy and the design makes it stick way out, so if you barely even touch it, or a cord that comes out of it, it will fall right out and clunk loudly on whatever surface is below. Countless times I've expected to find my phone and tablet charged, only to find the unit laying on the floor. Don't recommend until they redesign.
customer_reviews.author: yepcandoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, reasonably priced Anker chargers & charger cords
customer_reviews.text: I got this dual port wall charger for my daughter to replace a bad one she'd gotten for Christmas. With the exception of the wall charger that came with my Samsung Galaxy Note phone, I have had to replace every wall charger, car charger & all the charger cords I'd previously owned (some several times over) & replaced them with Anker products. Who knew such things would go bad! These have yet to need replacing since, your money will be well spent & the prices are agreeable. Now I just need them to make earbuds! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: KDunn

customer_reviews.title: Charged iPhone 11 from 5% to 38% in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Charger arrived a day early. Nice packaging. No extra/wasted packaging. Did research on this product and though I was looking for the 4 outlet version, this one seemed to be ok for my needs. Keeps things charged up next to my bed along with the tablet. Before this I only had a single USB for charging. I also got the Anker 6' USB-Lightning cord because I got tired of the phone getting yanked out of my hand when I grabbed it to turn off the alarms in the morning. Seems to charge quickly as reviewed. So now I have a 2nd fast charger. One upstairs and one downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Nonaka

customer_reviews.title: Not even a week...**UPDATE 7/20**
customer_reviews.text: Receieved 6/27not even a week of using and it stopped working. Very disappointing! We also tried different wires and still nothing. The light still come on but it doesnt charge. **UPDATE 7/20** Received a replacement shortly after my review. Wanted to wait at least a week or 2 before updating. New product is working great and both girls are happy their iPads get changed fast at the same time..THANK YOU FOR TAKING CARE OF YOUR CUSTOMERS.
customer_reviews.author: Taisha

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted (3 years)
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 years. I kept this unit at home and plugged into the same outlet almost permanently. Only traveled with it a few times and never dropped it. I used it for a battery charger which had low amperage demands (~1 amp), so I probably never even maxed out the amp limit on a port. Was nice while it lasted, but it decided to expire on me today. Pretty disappointed in this, considering how much I babied it. Will select a different brand for its replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Enraged WereDonkey

customer_reviews.title: Paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this charger for an upcoming vacation. Upon plugging it in, it charged for 2 seconds and then stopped. Tried different outlets and different cords to no avail. Thankfully my wife brought her own charger so we could share for the 9 days. Plugged the phone in at 15%, and checked it roughly 3 hours later and the phone was dead. Changed outlets and plugged back in. Phone showed the charging "lightning bolt" so I left it charge. Checked on it again a couple hours after, and it was still at 0. Oddly enough, it seems to be have the charging power to charge the battery pack but not enough to charge the S10+. I dont understand it. Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kastelic

customer_reviews.title: Consistent quality
customer_reviews.text: We have a number of Anker charging devices and all have worked well, worn well, and travel well. This one, so far, is no exception. It's solid, wrapped well for shipping, includes useful information. It's great for travel and reducing the number of wall plug adapters needed. We have a five-port model, too -- traveled with it for about 10 years now and it continues to work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DGB

customer_reviews.title: Great but not all great.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is going on with this but only one USB port seems to be working. Anker is usually a fantastic product. I have several Anker battery packs and have never had any issues with them even after 3 years of use. I should have read the reviews sooner and maybe went with another product.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment- I have come to expect much better from this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this for a month and now it’s no longer working. I’ve tried different cords and different outlets but nothing makes a difference. It goes back and forth between charging and not charging every two seconds and nothing actually gets charged :( I’m really disappointed, I LOVE Anker products and have never had anything from them that I’ve found unsatisfactory until this. I wanted to reach out to the seller rather than just leaving a disappointing review but didn’t see that it was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy
customer_reviews.text: I have only one beef with this thing and it’s that I have to plug it in upside down or it falls out. I imagine the blue light could bother some people but it’s really helpful for me because I know it’s still plugged in. We have 2 of these with the charging docks and they are perfect, minus that whole top heavy/fall out of the outlet thing that occasionally happens.
customer_reviews.author: Hoooosier

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: great customer service. Company reached out to me about my broken charger. Offered to replace free of charge with the latest model charger. They shipped me a new one less than a week later. It works like a charm. I greatly appreciate a company standing behind their product and making this right. Will buy next charger from them. Many thanks! Bought this charger at the beginning of January. Return window closed at the beginning of February. Beginning of March it quit working all together.No idea why!? Was only using to charge my iPhone every other day. Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Payton

product_meta.title: USB Charger, Anker Elite Dual Port 24W Wall Charger, PowerPort 2 with PowerIQ and Foldable Plug, for iPhone 11/Xs/XS Max/XR/X/8/7/6/Plus, iPad Pro/Air 2/Mini 3/Mini 4, Samsung S4/S5, and More
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteModel Number: A2023

PowerPort 2 Elite
The Optimized 2-Port USB Wall Charger

From ANKER, America’s Leading USB Charging Brand
- Faster and safer charging with our advanced technology
- 50 million+ happy users and counting

Fast-Charging Technology
Anker’s exclusive PowerIQ and VoltageBoost combine to deliver high-speed charging for any device.

Ultra-Powerful
Dual USB ports pump out 24 watts. Enough power to simultaneously charge two iPads at full speed.

Comprehensive Safety
Anker’s exclusive MultiProtect safety system provides surge protection, short circuit prevention, temperature control and more advanced features to keep you and your devices completely safe.



Travel Ready
Compact design, foldable plug and international voltage input make PowerPort 2 Elite incredibly portable and ideal for travel—anywhere in the world.

Durable Design
Robust textured exterior resists wear, scuffing, and scratching. Premium internal components ensure perfect operation—even after being bumped around, shoved in a bag, or dropped on the floor.

Worry-Free Warranty
At Anker, we believe in our products. That's why we back them all with an 18-month warranty and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support.

Note: 
This charger does not support Quick Charge 3.0. Devices equipped with Quick Charge, like the Samsung Galaxy series, will charge at normal speeds. 

LED indicator will illuminate and stay a constant blue when plugged in, regardless of whether or not a connected device is fully charged.
feature_bullets: The Anker Advantage: Join the 50 million+ powered by our leading technology.
Less Time Charging: Patented PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies charge any device at its fastest possible speed, up to 2.4A. (Does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge.)
Durable Design: Robust textured casing and premium internal components ensure perfect performance regardless of scrapes, bumps, or drops.
Travel Ready: Compact design, foldable plug, and 100-240 volt input are ideal for worldwide travel.
What You Get: Anker PowerPort 2 Elite, welcome guide, our worry-free 18-month warranty and friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars26,050 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Anker PowerPort 2 Elite, welcome guide, our worry-free 18-month warranty and friendly customer service.
